information: Since it was founded by Winfried and Helena Friedel in 1990, WISTEMA GmbH has been active in the chemical distribution industry. As a steadily growing family business, we are in a strong position in the globally dynamic market and have branches or agents in Europe and overseas. Our activities focus on high-quality distillates in the solvent, alcohol, oil and fatty acid sector. Besides this, we serve markets in the life sciences (intermediates for the pharmaceutical industry, personal care, household cleaning products) and food sector, as well as technical applications, together with the prime quality manufacturers we represent. Our establishment in Kerpen, Germany looks after the polymer and wax business unit as well as the sale of salvage and surplus. As a certified disposal firm, we establish individual recycling concepts and our regularly trained specialist personnel comprehensively advise our customers. WISTEMA employs 30 employees with an annual turnover of approx. â‚¬50 million.
